ygData.subject: Re: Warning: Watch out for GM's!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know what to say honestly, all the problems I have been having as of late, the server nonesense, the Rogue class being ignored save for the few
ygData.messageBody:
bill@... wrote:

> From: bill@...
>
> Gang,
> Today - I had a run in with one of the GMs. You're not going to believe this,
> but it's shades of Ultima Online all over again.
>

I don't know what to say honestly, all the problems I have been having as of late,
the server nonesense, the Rogue class being ignored save for the few scraps thrown
it a second ago. And I've even heard some nasty GM "I don't give a fuck" stories.
This takes the cake, this goes against everything McQuaid said he didn't want EQ to
be. This makes them all slimeball liars IMHO. In a word this enrages me in a way no
words can express...

> We all know that character names are restricted by bounds of good
> taste/decency/keeping with the spirit of the game. So you can imagine I was a
> little surprised when a characer named "Cokaine" shows up. Not only that, he's
> using /ooc to carry on private conversations all over the place on Brell.
>
> I /tell him to please use a channel for side chatter. I won't repeate the
> response I got. I warn him to cool it, or I /petition. Use your imagination on
> the response I got - and it was to store my goodies in a locked box either!
>
> I give up and /petition. This guy was really all over the place. A few minutes
> later, a GM pops up and tells me to not make false complaints! I let him have
> both barrels, and hard. A minute later he comes back and tells me that in fact,
> Cokaine is also known as Vampyre aka Jason White. He's a GM!
>
> I asked why he could get away this conduct. The GM says "he's had a bad day -
> his wife died yesterday". C'mon - do I have "Hello I'm a stupid 14 year old"
> written on my forehead?
>

His wife died eh? Why don't I believe he'd be playing EQ if his wife died. I
wouldn't be playing EQ if my mate died. This is bullshit pure and simple. Congrats
people, welcome to the new P.T. Barnum show and guess who all the suckers are? This
way to the egress people, Asheron's Call is beginning to sound better everyday....

> Needless to say, I've sent a formal complaint in. I'd suggest that if you get
> someone who's just a bit too obnoxious, don't be suprised if it's a GM.
>
>

*sigh* Maybe I'm just disgruntled, maybe I'm right. Maybe none of the GMs give a
damn, I happen to think that. I am truly disgusted at this point, when will people
learn that the UO "Band-Aid" approach doesn't work? If monsters are having AI
problems with objects you don't make them "Omnipotent masters of death", you just
spend some time fixing the problem. But oh, I'm sorry, that takes effort, a word
editing out by Verant's language filter apparently. I feel kind of sad that I
finally found a nice community in the midst of this festering shithole of a game,
but hey, Humanity has been fucking each other over for thousands of years, why drop
the tradition now?

Angry,
Lonewolf
